name: Spider-Man
description: Bring home your friendly neighborhood Spider-Man action figure and join him on exciting adventures!

name: Batman
description: Unleash the Dark Knight with this detailed Batman action figure. Perfect for fans of the Caped Crusader!

name: Yoda
description: Master the Force with the wise and powerful Yoda action figure. May the Force be with you!

name: Optimus Prime
description: Lead the Autobots into battle with this iconic Optimus Prime action figure. Transform and roll out!

name: Iron Man
description: Suit up as Tony Stark's armored Avenger with this incredible Iron Man action figure. Ready for action!

name: Superman
description: Soar through the skies as the Man of Steel with this powerful Superman action figure. Embrace your inner superhero!

name: Darth Vader
description: Join the Dark Side with the Sith Lord Darth Vader action figure. Rule the galaxy with the power of the Force!

name: Bumblebee
description: Race into action with the brave Autobot Bumblebee action figure. Protect the Earth from the Decepticons!

name: Captain America
description: Fight for justice and freedom with the patriotic Captain America action figure. Assemble the Avengers!

name: Wonder Woman
description: Embrace your inner warrior with the mighty Wonder Woman action figure. Defend truth, justice, and equality!

name: Obi-Wan Kenobi
description: Train in the ways of the Force with the legendary Jedi Knight Obi-Wan Kenobi action figure. May the Force be with you!

name: Megatron
description: Unleash the power of the Decepticons with the mighty Megatron action figure. Conquer the Autobots and rule Cybertron!

name: Thor
description: Harness the power of thunder with the mighty Thor action figure. Defend Asgard and the Nine Realms!

name: Joker
description: Embrace chaos with the notorious Joker action figure. Cause mayhem in Gotham City!

name: Han Solo
description: Join the Rebel Alliance with the resourceful Han Solo action figure. Pilot the Millennium Falcon and defeat the Empire!

name: Starscream
description: Unleash the treacherous Starscream action figure and plot against Megatron for control of the Decepticons!

name: Black Widow
description: Infiltrate the enemy with the deadly Black Widow action figure. Skilled in espionage and martial arts!

name: Aquaman
description: Dive into adventure with the aquatic hero Aquaman action figure. Command the seas and protect Atlantis!

name: Luke Skywalker
description: Join the Rebellion with the courageous Luke Skywalker action figure. Train in the ways of the Jedi and confront the Dark Side!

name: Grimlock
description: Unleash the ferocious power of the Dinobot leader Grimlock action figure. Rule the prehistoric world of Transformers!

name: Hulk
description: Unleash the incredible power of the Hulk action figure. Smash
